fields.description:
I have made a very short view
<Alloy>
	<Window class="container">
		<View layout="absolute" backgroundColor="red" width="Ti.UI.FILL" height="Ti.UI.SIZE">
			<View width="100" height="100" backgroundColor="blue" />
			<View left="10" width="Ti.UI.FILL" height="100" backgroundColor="yellow" />
		</View>
	</Window>
</Alloy>

There are two problems :
- there is a margin on the right of the yellow square corresponding to the left property
- there is a "bottom margin" (which is not displayed if I use layout="vertical") that matches with the blue view height (see red part on the bottom)
fields.summary: Strange display on Android with horizontal layout and width Ti.UI.FILL

comments.body: I cannot reproduce this issue with the provided test case on either iOS or Android platform. We see consistent layout behavior with SDK 3.2.2 release. Let us know your Titanium SDK version and device information to reproduce this issue. Please make sure that your screenshot is for the attached test case.

I use 3.2.2.GA
On a Android 4.2.2 device (Galaxy Tab 3 10" and genymotion Custom 10")
And yes the screenshot is correct :-)

I'll try later on an other mac
